# The `PhiValuesCallbackVH` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh">CallbackVH</a> to notify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> when a value is deleted or replaced, so that the cached information for that value can be cleared to avoid dangling pointers to invalid values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PhiValues::PhiValuesCallbackVH</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh">CallbackVH</a> to notify <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> when a value is deleted or replaced, so that the cached information for that value can be cleared to avoid dangling pointers to invalid values.

Definition at line 90 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>.
